title: (x) Fontleech logo slab serif w/ characteristic ink traps - Kontrapunkt {Lauri}
content:
Could somebody identify this please. I’m sure i’ve seen it many times before but just can’t remember where.

Cheers  
Christoffer

 [‹ (x) "Madea's Family Reunion" movie poster - H&FJ Leviathan {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080314123327/http:/typophile.com/node/19214 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Funky unicase display font - P22 Sniplash {Stuart} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080314123327/http:/typophile.com/node/19201 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Christoffer

comments.content:
I see i wasn’t very successful uploading the picture so i simply paste a link to it here. It’s the headline saying “Fontleech” in blue.

[http://fontleech.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080314123327/http:/fontleech.com/ "http://fontleech.com/")

/Christoffer

Just for comparison, have a look at [Emigré Cholla Slab](http://web.archive.org/web/20080314123327/http:/www.emigre.com/dp/getfontpage.php?PChoSlR.html). The counter shapes are not the same, but stylistically, it seems to me that they have a lot of similarity. (I was coming back to see how close Cholla Slab was, in case that was the answer.)

- Mike Yanega
